mapper.sql: PI_NAME, PI_MEETING_TIME, PI_MEMBER_CNT, PI_CREDAT, PI_EXPDAT, MI_NUM, UI_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT P_VIEW.PI_NUM, P_VIEW.MNTNM, MEM_NUM, P_VIEW.PI_MEMBER_CNT, COUNT(PUL.UI_NUM) LIKE_NUM FROM (SELECT PI.PI_NUM, MI.MNTNM, COUNT(PM.UI_NUM) MEM_NUM, PI.PI_MEMBER_CNT FROM PARTY_INFO PI INNER JOIN MOUNTAIN_INFO MI ON PI.MI_NUM = MI.MI_NUM INNER JOIN PARTY_MEMBER PM ON PI.PI_NUM = PM.PI_NUM AND PM.PM_ACTIVE = 1 WHERE PI.PI_ACTIVE = 1 GROUP BY PI.PI_NUM) P_VIEW INNER JOIN PARTY_USER_LIKE PUL ON P_VIEW.PI_NUM = PUL.PI_NUM
AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
GROUP BY PUL.PI_NUM ORDER BY LIKE_NUM DESC
SELECT UI.UI_NICKNAME FROM PARTY_INFO PI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PI.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM WHERE PI.PI_NUM = #{piNum}
SELECT UI.UI_NICKNAME FROM PARTY_INFO PI INNER JOIN PARTY_MEMBER PM ON PI.PI_NUM = PM.PI_NUM AND PM.PM_ACTIVE = 1 INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PM.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM WHERE PI.PI_NUM = #{piNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY_INFO ( PI_NAME, PI_MEETING_TIME, PI_MEMBER_CNT, PI_CREDAT, PI_EXPDAT, MI_NUM, UI_ID, PI_ACTIVE ) VALUES( #{piName}, #{piMeetingTime}, #{piMemberCnt}, #{piCredat}, #{piExpdat}, #{miNum}, #{uiId}, 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTY_INFO SET PI_NAME = #{piName}, PI_MEETING_TIME = #{piMeetingTime}, PI_MEMBER_CNT = #{piMemberCnt}, PI_CREDAT = #{piCredat}, PI_EXPDAT = #{piExpdat}, MI_NUM = #{miNum}, UI_ID = #{uiId} WHERE PI_NUM = #{piNum}
